name: Little Nightmares Project
description:
I was bored one day so I made these sprites. You can use them if you want as long as you show me your project once its done. This is a Game Maker Studios Project btw so you need that to use this.

Here's the file  yyz file  if you want to edit it.

https://www.mediafire.com/file/td1kx04r1pmmzlc/Little_Nightmares.yyz/file 

Also let me know if you like the sprites. I think both look pretty good! :D
